description: user_data passed in xml in the server request is ignored. This was uncovered during api sample test creation here: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/12987/
title: user_data can't be passed in xml

comments.content: user_data passed in xml in the server request is ignored

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 9d0a6d88d54ad38c4ccc564aa417beed310712fc
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 14 00:56:42 2012 -0700

    Deserialize user_data in xml servers request
    
    Also adds better validation for b64 encoded data since python
    will happily ignore illegal bytes in the base64 encoded data.
    
    Fixes bug 1050797
    
    Change-Id: I4f380d029ec2d51f130a6dbd581410873e414216
